content.query:
USE [CDC-SYNAPSE]

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'Staging' AND TABLE_NAME = 'Transactions')
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [Staging].[Transactions]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [Staging].[Transactions]
(
	[TRAN_CREATE_BY] [nvarchar](max),
	[TRAN_CREATE_DATE] [datetime],
	[TRAN_SEQNO] [int],
	[TRAN_ACCOUNT_NO] [int],
	[TRAN_SUBACC_NO] [int],
	[TRAN_REVERSAL_IND] [varchar](1),
	[TRAN_SOC_SEQNO] [int],
	--[TRAN_BRN_CODE] [varchar](4),
	[TRAN_ACT_CODE] [varchar](6),
	[TRAN_GACT_TYPE] [varchar](1),
	[TRAN_GTRANS_TYPE] [varchar](3),
	[TRAN_CLASS] [varchar](6),
	[TRAN_TRANS_CODE] [varchar](6),
	[TRAN_REFERENCE] [varchar](max),
	--[TRAN_AMOUNT_DB] [float],
	[TRAN_AMOUNT_CR] [float](2)
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/transactions',
	DATA_SOURCE = [TRAN_STAGING],
	FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFF]
)
AS
SELECT P.*
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'output/year=*/month=*/day=*/hour=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'TRAN_LANDING',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS P
